original_title: Kata Strofová a tajomstvo snehových vločiek
overview: Like many other children, Cate Strophe is impatiently waiting for her Christmas presents, but she cannot wait for the snow to start falling. Alas, the snow doesn’t come. In a split second, lighting up the Christmas tree becomes an unpredictable adventure!
title: Cate Strophe and the Secret of Snowflakes
